message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $15,500.  This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's a fair compromise. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
